name: Click Real Fast
description:
Ah, a nice, calm, in-depth game... is what you could say about literally any other game, except this one.

A game so challenging you may need to seek medical attention, yet so simple you can play it with your eyes closed... as you should.

Features

  • Clicking
  • Blinding bloom effects
  • Many Colors
  • Clicking
  • Deafening Music
  • Special Effects
  • Clicking
  • Big Anger
  • And much more!

Test the lifespan of your mouse, keyboard, or controller, by Clicking... Real... FAST
